item.g:title: Imperial Crest Panjabi (Heritage Olive) - S
item.g:description: Fit Type: Slim Fit A refined expression of modern luxury, the Imperial Crest Panjabi is designed to deliver a premium festive look with elevated detailing. Crafted from Regent Comfort Twill fabric, this style combines structured elegance with everyday comfort, featuring signature embroidery that enhances its sophisticated appearance. Key Features: Premium luxury embroidery around collar, placket, and cuff Dual-layer placket design for a clean, posh finish Non-functional display buttons blended seamlessly with embroidery Hidden functional inner placket with premium designed metal snaps Matching premium metal snaps at cuff Side pockets on both sides for everyday convenience Structured yet comfortable silhouette for modern styling Delivered with over 50% recycled polybag packaging Fabric: Regent Comfort Twill 65% Cotton 35% Polyester GSM: 200

item.g:title: Imperial Pearl Panjabi (Optical White) - S
item.g:description: Fit Type: Slim Fit Minimal elegance meets refined craftsmanship. The Imperial Pearl Panjabi is designed for those who appreciate subtle luxury. Featuring delicate multi-thread embroidery around the neck stand, complemented by a clean accent at the placket and coordinated embroidery at the sleeve hem, this piece reflects understated sophistication. The modern structured sleeve hem, slim body fit, and refined details create a sharp yet graceful silhouette perfect for festive occasions and elevated everyday wear. Antique silver-colored designer snap buttons add a premium touch to the front placket, while practical side pockets ensure functional comfort without compromising style. Key Features Premium multi-thread embroidery at neck stand, placket & sleeve hem Modern structured sleeve hem design Slim fit silhouette for a sharp appearance Antique silver designer snap buttons Both-side functional pockets Delivered in 50%+ recycled polybag (eco-conscious packaging) Fabric: Structured Micro Jacquard 100% Polyester Dobby GSM: 120

item.g:title: Men's L/S Urban Fit Shirt - S
item.g:description: The Mens L/S Urban Shirt is engineered with a modern urban silhouette, developed to deliver a sharper appearance with everyday comfort. The fit is refined through precise pattern engineering, featuring balanced shoulder positioning, controlled armhole shaping and a clean sleeve profile that improves natural drape while avoiding the restriction of a slim fit. Each style is constructed using export-grade sewing standards, reinforced placket structure and stabilized collar and cuff assemblies to ensure long-term shape retention and consistent performance in regular wear. Pattern accuracy, stitch control and finishing consistency are maintained through CLOTHIGOs in-house production process, allowing uniform fit and quality across all designs within the Urban Shirt range. Designed and manufactured by CLOTHIGO, the Mens LS Urban Shirt reflects modern garment engineering focused on comfort, durability and clean contemporary styling.

Each style is constructed using export-grade sewing standards, reinforced placket structure and stabilized collar and cuff assemblies to ensure long-term shape retention and consistent performance in regular wear. Pattern accuracy, stitch control and finishing consistency are maintained through CLOTHIGOs in-house production process, allowing uniform fit and quality across all designs within the Urban Shirt range. Designed and manufactured by CLOTHIGO, the Mens LS Urban Shirt reflects modern garment engineering focused on comfort, durability and clean contemporary styling.

item.g:title: Mens S/S Turn-Up Shirt - S
item.g:description: Crafted for a refined, modern look, the Mens S/S Turn-Up Shirt combines classic style with contemporary tailoring. This short-sleeve shirt features a regular collar and a meticulously shaped fit around the armhole and bicep, offering a more defined, slimmer appearance without compromising comfort. Made with posh fabrications that provide a smooth, luxurious feel, this shirt delivers the perfect balance of casual sophistication and effortless style. Whether dressed up or down, it's a versatile addition to your wardrobe. Details Short sleeve with turn-up cuffs Regular collar with a crisp finish Shaped armhole and bicep for a tailored fit Made from premium fabrics for a refined look and feel Perfect for smart casual or weekend wear Pair it with chinos or denim for a look that transitions seamlessly from day to night.
